subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: In Oakland, the Tigers’ Justin Verlander won his 12th start in a row, becoming the first to reach 24 wins since 2002 and extending his scoreless-innings streak to 17.
snippet: In Oakland, the Tigers’ Justin Verlander won his 12th start in a row, becoming the first to reach 24 wins since 2002 and extending his scoreless-innings streak to 17.
